resources.string: Depression Meme of a salesman trying to sell a man a water heater with the text \"Salesman: *Slaps top of water heater* With this bad boy you can cry on the shower floor for 45 minutes straight\"
Depression Meme of skeleton cuddling 3 orange cats with the text \"When you\'re dead inside and sick of life but at least there are cats\"
You can easily return to the past
But no one is there anymore
